yepcode_api_token.title: YepCode API Token
yepcode_api_token.description: Your YepCode API token. Visit Settings > API credentials in your YepCode account to create one.

mcp_options.title: YepCode MCP Options
mcp_options.description: Optional comma-separated list of options. 'disableRunCodeTool' disables the code execution tool. 'runCodeCleanup' skips the cleanup of executed code, keeping it for audit purposes.
